to: Htio sam steći još prijatelja.

from: For some reason I wasn't happy, so one day I just packed up and flew to Spain.
to: Iz nekog razloga nisam bio sretan, pa sam se jednog dana spakirao i odletio u Španjolsku.

from: This make no sense, I screamed.
to: Ovo nema smisla, vrištao sam.

from: Let me lift that for you, I wouldn't be happy if something happened to you.
to: Dopusti da ti to podignem, ne bih bio sretan da ti se nešto desi.

from: Let me bake the pie, I insisted.
to: Dopustite mi da ispečem pitu, inzistirao sam.
